channel.title: I Love Resharper
channel.description: As I've mentioned before, I love Resharper from those crazily clever folks at JetBrains.  Today I installed an Early Access version of 3.0.2 into Visual Studio 2008 and all the goodness has returned.  No need to write a Using statement...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Igor Abade+00:00
item.description: I second that, Martin. As an early user of ReSharper (having used IntelliJ IDEA before that) right now I just can't develop without it anymore. Actually, it's quite funny when I go to another dev's computer which doesn't have ReSharper installed. I feel a little "impaired" - none of my shortcut keys work anymore! :-D
item.dc:creator: Igor Abade
